answers.author: Alexandra Iannolo
answers.text:
Hello,
I found some examples of volunteers being used to both produce and maintain public art.
The Town of Waynesville, NC has a volunteer program for short-term art projects.
http://www.townofwaynesville.org/content/view/358/332/
The San Francisco Arts Commission asks for youth volunteers to help create murals throughout the community.
http://www.sfartscommission.org/CAE/art-in-storefronts/chinatown/2010/05/17/wentworth-alley/
Washington DC has a similar program to combat graffiti and turn it into art.
http://muralsdc.wordpress.com/
Other communities use volunteer services to maintain and create public gardens.
Orange County, CA 
http://icma.org/en/icma/knowledge_network/documents/kn/Document/303230/Orange_County_Parks_Second_Sundays_Habitat_Restoration_Program
Coppell, TX
http://icma.org/en/Article/100267/Coppell_TX_Community_Garden_completes_major_garden_makeover
I also included an article describing the best practices for managing volunteers.
http://icma.org/en/icma/knowledge_network/documents/kn/Document/7776/Managing_Volunteers_in_a_City
Ali Iannolo
Knowledge Network Intern
aiannolo@ICMA.org


Hello,

I found some examples of volunteers being used to both produce and maintain public art.
The Town of Waynesville, NC has a volunteer program for short-term art projects.
http://www.townofwaynesville.org/content/view/358/332/
The San Francisco Arts Commission asks for youth volunteers to help create murals throughout the community.
http://www.sfartscommission.org/CAE/art-in-storefronts/chinatown/2010/05/17/wentworth-alley/
Washington DC has a similar program to combat graffiti and turn it into art.
http://muralsdc.wordpress.com/
Other communities use volunteer services to maintain and create public gardens.
Orange County, CA 
http://icma.org/en/icma/knowledge_network/documents/kn/Document/303230/Orange_County_Parks_Second_Sundays_Habitat_Restoration_Program
Coppell, TX
http://icma.org/en/Article/100267/Coppell_TX_Community_Garden_completes_major_garden_makeover
I also included an article describing the best practices for managing volunteers.
http://icma.org/en/icma/knowledge_network/documents/kn/Document/7776/Managing_Volunteers_in_a_City

Ali Iannolo
Knowledge Network Intern
aiannolo@ICMA.org

answers.author: Jayme Bosio
answers.text:
Palm Beach County, FL, Government funds an "Art in Public Places" program with duties that include the installation of all artwork in and on county property, and the administration of the PBC Artist's Registry. Their web site includes contacts to help you with your question concerning the use of volunteers. Address: http://www.pbcgov.com/fdo/art/ .
#


Palm Beach County, FL, Government funds an "Art in Public Places" program with duties that include the installation of all artwork in and on county property, and the administration of the PBC Artist's Registry. Their web site includes contacts to help you with your question concerning the use of volunteers. Address: http://www.pbcgov.com/fdo/art/ .

#

author: Nathan Johnson
text: How do Cities with a Public Art program use volunteers to help with public art maintenance?
title: Public Art and Volunteers
